Metallica: Some Kind of Monster

Ano: 2004

IMDb ID: tt0387412

Classificação: 7.5

Sinopse: Some Kind of Monster is a music documentary about Metallica's making of their album St. Anger and the difficulties they had to go through in the process. The directors shot over 1200 hours and followed the band around night and day for over a year to create this documentary.—Mathias Nielsen
